description:
With this app you can use the front-facing camera as mirror and take snapshots.

It's quite easy. Download and start the app. Then you'll see a frame that shows you everything the front-facing camera records. Click the green button to make a photo. That's the way it works. 

Of course you can view, share or delete the captured photos. They are all stored locally onto your device so you can manage them onto your PC or Laptop.

Sounds useful? For sure, it is! 

*** specifically developed for Palm Pre 3 ***

Powered by Tamoggemon, you can contact us via email to get free, fast and professional support.
